statements: SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, metric_name FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE device_id = 100;
SELECT device_id, MAX(metric_value) AS max_value FROM network_performance_metrics GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE 'packet%';
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value FROM network_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC, metric_value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE device_id = 2 GROUP BY device_id, metric_name;
SELECT metric_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_records FROM network_performance_metrics GROUP BY metric_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY number_of_records DESC;
SELECT device_id, MAX(metric_value) AS max_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE 'packet_loss%' GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT timestamp, AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' GROUP BY timestamp ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics;
SELECT id, latency, timestamp, host FROM network_performance_metrics;
SELECT host, latency FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE latency > 10;
SELECT * FROM network_errors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT host, error_message FROM network_errors WHERE error_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT host,AVG(latency) FROM network_performance_metrics GROUP BY host HAVING AVG(latency) > 5;
SELECT host, COUNT(*) AS error_count FROM network_errors GROUP BY host ORDER BY error_count DESC;
SELECT host,AVG(latency) FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE host LIKE 'server%' GROUP BY host;
SELECT host,timestamp,error_message FROM network_errors WHERE error_message LIKE 'Connection%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, latency_ms FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE latency_ms > 50
SELECT * FROM troubleshooting_logs WHERE error_code LIKE 'ERR%' ORDER BY log_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT data_type, AVG(value) FROM analysis_data GROUP BY data_type
SELECT * FROM analysis_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, latency_ms, download_speed_mb FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE upload_speed_mb > 20;
SELECT * FROM troubleshooting_logs WHERE error_code LIKE '500%' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT data_id, timestamp, data_type FROM analysis_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT timestamp, latency_ms, download_speed_mb, upload_speed_mb FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'HQ';
SELECT device_id, location FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT * FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC, device_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY location, device_name;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, log_message FROM network_logs JOIN network_devices ON network_logs.device_id = network_devices.device_id WHERE log_id < 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, network_speed, packet_loss FROM network_devices JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id WHERE network_speed > 1000 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, analysis_result FROM network_analysis WHERE analysis_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, message FROM network_logs WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT metric_name, value, timestamp FROM network_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT error_message, timestamp FROM network_errors WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_type='Router';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT nd.device_name, nl.message FROM network_devices nd JOIN network_logs nl ON nd.device_id = nl.device_id;
SELECT nm.metric_name, nm.value, nd.device_name FROM network_metrics nm JOIN network_devices nd ON nm.device_id = nd.device_id WHERE nm.value > 100;
